  • Deprecated Classes

  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.mapzen.android.graphics.model.MarkerOptions

  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.mapzen.android.graphics.model.BitmapMarkerManager.addMarker(MarkerOptions)
    com.mapzen.android.graphics.MapzenMap.applySceneUpdates()
    com.mapzen.android.graphics.MapzenMap.queueSceneUpdate(String, String)
    com.mapzen.android.location.LocationFactory.sharedClient(Context)
    This method should not be used outside the SDK. Now that Lost has proper support for multiple location clients exposing a shared client in no longer needed. Behavior has been updated to create a new client instance for each new Context. This fixes a bug where the shared client was created with a Context that had been subsequently destroyed and future attempts to bind the fused location service would fail.
    com.mapzen.android.location.LocationFactory.sharedClient(Context, ConnectionCallbacks)
    This method should not be used outside the SDK. Now that Lost has proper support for multiple location clients exposing a shared client in no longer needed. Behavior has been updated to create a new client instance for each new Context. This fixes a bug where the shared client was created with a Context that had been subsequently destroyed and future attempts to bind the fused location service would fail.
